page.title: 08A WEEK IN OUR LIVES
page.content: Wednesday:Today was tennis and athletics clubs.Also boys practised football.Most of the children watched the television.One dad had gone hang-gliding!At school we did p.e and music. Thursday:Someone played tennis and then shopped in waitrose in Marlborough.I watched 'Street hawk' on the television.Some girls did guides. Friday:It was cubs tonight.Some people got their comics tonight.Someone did swimming and another person did piano practise.A couple of people went on a farm vist. Saturday:Someone went to the gymkhana. Another person went to the youth club. Yet another person watched 'Rub-a-dub-tub' on the television. There was also a car boot sale at school.
